tutorial.title: Tutorial
tutorial.desc: Get started with DEMOLAND and learn how to code websites!

introduction-to-computation.title: Introduction to Computation
introduction-to-computation.shortdesc: A beginner’s guide on how to code
introduction-to-computation.desc: What is code? What can we use it for? This book is an introduction to coding through the lens of web programming. We’ll cover object-oriented programming using JavaScript, and use HTML and CSS to create visual and interactive outputs.
